points.description: Good: Channel immediately upstream or downstream of project reach (i.e., within 1 km or 0.62 mi) has native bed and bank material. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)

Fair: Channel immediately upstream or downstream of project reach (i.e., within 1 km or 0.62 mi) has native bed and bank material that is highly embedded by fine sediment. (Suggested index range 0.50-0.69)

Fair: Channel immediately upstream or downstream of project reach (i.e., within 1 km or 0.62 mi) has native bed and bank material that is highly embedded by fine sediment. (Suggested index range 0.30-0.49)
Poor: Channel immediately upstream or downstream of project reach (i.e., within 1 km or 0.62 mi) is concrete, piped, or hardened. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.29)
